start.intro: This app was specifically designed for musicians like you to keep track of your repertoire and your progress. Some features of this app:

features.list: Create own list of songs you've mastered or want to learn (Login to persist data)
features.track: Keep an overview of your progress
features.share: Share or export list of your repertoire
features.search: Search with autocomplete for genres, artists, and titles
features.blog: How-tos and further articles about making
features.github: Planned feature overview and known bugs
features.feedback: We hope you find our app useful and look forward to your

feedback.note: Dote the following questions on a scale from 1 to 10 ascending, where 10 is the most important to you.
feedback.qBackup: How important is it to you to be able to backup your data?
feedback.qSearch: How important is it to you that data is suggested to you when creating new pieces?
feedback.title: Artist / Title
feedback.qShare: How important is it for you to be able to share your content with other users?
feedback.qBlog: How useful is it for you to browse a blog about how-tos and recommendations?
feedback.qOther: Do you have any other ideas and suggestions for the app or have you noticed serious bugs?
feedback.ty: Thank you for participating in this feedback survey.

resource.title: Enter resource path
resource.caption: Enter a uri path to any resource:
resource.info: Use a cloud storage like google drive to upload your files. Then copy the url here.

songs.noPersist: You are not signed in, so data won't be persisted after leaving the app!

table.search: Search for anything e. g. genre, artist, todo

settings.reset-text: Reset stored column settings, filters and grouping.
settings.delete-profile: Delete profile (All data will be lost)
settings.delete-advice: You should export your data before deletion.
